titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing with illustrations of a document entitled "Committee on Appropriations, United States Senate, 138th Anniversary. 1867-2005".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/8/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the printing as a Senate document of a compilation of materials entitled "Committee on Appropriations, United States Senate, 138th Anniversary, 1867-2005."
